content.question: In line 6 (Vive . . . meo), we learn that the brother wants his sibling

choices.label: to pity the living and not the dead
to live during his brother’s lifetime as well as his own
to take care of his offspring when he is gone
to live only as long as he himself is alive

content.answer: to live during his brother’s lifetime as well as his own

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
